data.title: Life List of Films Seen (Version: 1 October - Marck Menke
data.meta_description: Life List of Films Seen (Version: 1 October - Marck Menke
data.text: Marck Menke, Lifetime List of Viewed Films (Version: 1 October 2012) The listing format is alphabetical by title, with notes pertaining to each film in square brackets. Alternate titles and non- English languages are given in italics, as are notes about my viewing experience, after the brackets. The second column lists the director(s). This list does not include long-term television series, introductions, excerpts, trailers or music videos. Film dates may variably refer to either the copyright year or the year of first release. Films requiring more notes are given additional indented lines. Abbreviations and codes used include: animation (‘anim’ or ‘animated’), black & white (‘b&w’), extensive clay animation (‘clay fx’), extensive computer generated imagery (‘CGI’), documentary film (‘docu’), English dubbed over original language (‘dubbed’nor ‘dub’), recorded stage production (‘rec. stage prod.’), short film (‘short’), ‘silent film’ (‘silent’ or ‘sil’), Television mini-series (‘TVmini’), made-for- television movie (‘TVmov’). A silent film is here considered as one that lacks a synchronized vocal soundtrack, even if music or sound effects were added later. Films made with transitional technologies (Movietone, Vitaphone, etc.) may or may not be labeled as ‘silent’ depending on the extent of the sound recording. A film with a soundtrack but no spoken dialogue may sometimes be identified as ‘score only’. Other information on this list includes: • Some geographic settings, which may or may not also be the filming location • Appearances by actors and other individuals I consider exceptionally noteworthy • Extensive gay, lesbian, bisexual or transsexual (GLBT) content is noted by ‘QR’. Relatively minor GLBT content is noted with a lowercase ‘qr’. Names and abbreviations of geographic settings and noteworthy individuals are listed after the main list of films. $30 [short film in Boys Life 3, Sara Gilbert, QR] 1999 Gregory Cooke 3D: A Brief History [short docu about 3D films & Dial M for Murder] 2004 Laurent Bouzereau 4 mosche di velluto grigio [Four Flies on Gray Velvet, Ital, Italy, Mimsy Farmer, qr] 1971 Dario Argento 5 Against the House [b&w, K.Grant, Brian Keith, G.Madison, K.Mathews, A.Moore, K.N.] 55 Phil Karlson 7 Faces of Dr. Lao [T.R., B.Eden] 1964 George Pal 7 th Voyage of Sinbad, The [clay fx, Baghdad, K.Grant, K.Mathews] 1958 Nathan Juran 8 1/2 [Italian, b&w, Italy, A.Aimée, C.Boratto, C.C., R.Falk, E.Gale, - - - M.Mast., S.Milo, B.Steele] 1963 Federico Fellini 8 Ball Bunny [Looney Tunes animated short film, Carib, NOLA, NYC, SAm, Mel Blanc] 1949 Chuck M. Jones 8 femmes [Fr, France, Fanny Ardant, E.Béart, D.Darrieux, C.Deneuve, I.H., qr] 2002 François Ozon 9 1/2 Weeks [NYC, K.B., M.Rourke] 1986 Adrian Lyne 10 Attitudes [J.J.B., Judy Tenuta, QR] 2004 Michael Gallant 10 Pesos [short film in Men’s Mix One, Argentina, QR] 2003 Matias Risi 13 Frightened Girls! [The Candy Web, London, Switzerland, Joyce Taylor, N.V.] 1963 William Castle 13 Ghosts [partly b&w, M.H., D.Woods] 1963 William Castle 13 Ghosts: The Magic of Illusion-o [short documentary about 13 Ghosts] 2001 Jeffrey Schwarz 13 Rue Madeleine [b&w, France, London, WDC, Annabella, R.B., J.Cagney, - - - R.Conte, S.Jaffe, F.Latimore, K.Malden, E.G.M.] 1947 Henry Hathaway 20 centimetros [Spanish, Spain, Mónica Cervera, P.Puyol, QR] 2005 Ramon Salazar 24 Nights [NYC, QR] 1998 Kieran Turner 24 th Day, The [NYC, J.Marsden QR] 2004 Tony Piccirillo 28 Days Later [London, Cillian Murphy] 2002 Danny Boyle 29 th & Gay [QR] 2005 Carrie Preston 39 Steps, The [b&w, London, Madeleine Carroll, Robert Donat] 1935 Alfred Hitchcock 42 nd Street [b&w, NYC, W.Baxter, G.Brent, B.Daniels, R.K., U.M., D.P., G.Rogers, T.Wing] 33 Lloyd Bacon 54 [NYC, N.Campbell, S.Hayek, L.Hutton, L.Luft, H.M., M.Myers, V.Perrine, R.P., M.Y., qr] 98 Mark Christopher 200 American [NYC, QR] 2004 Richard LeMay 200 Motels [Pamela Des Barres, K.Moon, R.Starr, F.Zappa, qr] 1971 T.
